info.description: API contains operations on Counter Party Settlement Instruction resource.

get.description: Gets a Counter Party Settlement Instructions by settle code.

post.description:
Create one or more Counter Party Settlement Instructions to a maximum of 100 per request.
Required fields:- brokerTicker,deliveryName,settlementParties.
 Users needs to have permissions under permType='brkrSettlm' for using this API.
post.summary: Batch Create Counter Party Settlement Instructions

post.description:
Updates status for multiple Counter Party Settlement Instructions.
(-- api-linter: core::0136::http-uri-suffix=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we are updating a particular column across counterparty settlement instructions, and not the entire object --)
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9048::rpc-name=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we are updating a particular column across counterparty settlement instructions, and not the entire object --)
(-- api-linter: core::0234::http-uri-suffix=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this api only updates status for a given list of settle codes, and is not a standard batch update API -)
post.summary: Batch Update Counter Party Settlement Instructions Status

post.description:
Filters Counter Party Settlement Instructions based on a single broker ticker(for basic filtering) or any combination of the following filters : 
List of broker tickers, broker type, delivery name, settlement instruction state and settlement instruction entity (for advance filtering).

get.description: Searches Counter Party Settlement Instructions based on the input query.

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

parameters.description: Search string (atleast two characters).
parameters.name: search

parameters.description:
Represents search type.

 - COUNTER_PARTY_SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTIONS_SEARCH_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The API will default to the BIC type
 - COUNTER_PARTY_SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTIONS_SEARCH_TYPE_BIC: This is the default value
Fields searched - BIC.
parameters.name: counterPartySettlementInstructionsSearchType

parameters.description:
The maximum value is 100; values above 100 will be coerced to 100
If unspecified, the default value to return is 100
The maximum number of CounterPartySettlementInstructions to return(Pagination is not supported currently).
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: A page token, received from a previous call(Pagination is not supported currently).
parameters.name: pageToken

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsActionType.description:
Represents type of validation being performed.

 - ACTION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - ACTION_TYPE_CREATE: Validation for create request.
 - ACTION_TYPE_UPDATE: Validation for update request.

enumsFilterType.description:
Represents type of filter being performed.

 - FILTER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - FILTER_TYPE_BASIC: Option for Basic filter- Filters Data on the basis of a single ticker and/or loadDefunct flag.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ADVANCE: Option for Advance filter - Filters data on the basis of advanced filters like list of tickers, BrokerType, entity , etc.
 - FILTER_TYPE_ID: Option for filter on list of id's- Filters data on the basis of list of id's.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 Counter party settlement instructions can be created in
a batch.
Broker Id, Delivery Instruction and  Settlement Instructions are mandatory
fields.
requests.title: Create counterparty settlement instructions request

skipBqlValidation.title:
Skip BQL Validation flag - to skip the bql validation for the request.
(-- api-linter: core::0233::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this flag is common to all request objects which determines whether to skip bql validation or not --)

isGenericTemplate.description:
This is a flag which should only be set as true if you want to create settlement instructions without passing the actual template definitions in the settlement parties map, i.e. If you wish to pass settlement parties as  [VALUE1, VALUE2,... VALUE30].
(-- api-linter: core::0233::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this flag is common to all POST request objects which determines the format in which settlement parties will be considered --)
isGenericTemplate.title: Is Generic Template flag

counterpartySettlementInstructions.description: Counterparty settlement instructions to be returned.
counterpartySettlementInstructions.title: Counterparty settlement instructions

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 Counter party settlement instructions can be updated in a
batch.
Id, Broker Id, Delivery Instruction and  Settlement Instructions are
mandatory fields.
requests.title: Update counterparty settlement instructions request

skipBqlValidation.title:
Skip BQL Validation flag - to skip the bql validation for the request.
(-- api-linter: core::0234::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this flag is common to all request objects which determines whether to skip bql validation or not --)

isGenericTemplate.description:
This is a flag which should only be set as true if you want to update settlement instructions without passing the actual template definitions in the settlement parties map, i.e. If you wish to pass settlement parties as  [VALUE1, VALUE2,... VALUE30].
(-- api-linter: core::0234::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this flag is common to all POST request objects which determines the format in which settlement parties will be considered --)
isGenericTemplate.title: Is Generic Template flag

status.description: The status of the operation in case of failure/success.

counterpartySettlementInstructionValidat.description: Represents the validation associated with the counterparty settlement instruction records.

v1CounterPartySettlementInstruction.description: CounterPartySettlementInstruction describes information about settlement instructions for a broker or account.

id.description:
Resources must have a 'id' field.

Name describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.
Represents Settle Code.

brokerId.description: Represents Aladdin Broker Identifier (Numeric), commonly referred to as broker code.

accountName.description: Represents account name of the settlement instruction.

deliveryName.description: Represents delivery name for the settlement instruction.

settlementInstructionRule.description: Represents rule like bql, which if evaluated to true, selects given instruction.

settlementInstructionModifier.description: Represents modifier of the settlement instruction record.

settlementInstructionModifyDate.description: Represents modified date of the settlement instruction record.

settlementInstructionReviewer.description: Represents reviewer of the settlement instruction record.

settlementInstructionReviewDate.description: Represents reviewed date of the settlement instruction record.

settlementParties.description: Represents the settlement parties associated with settlement instruction record.

settlementInstructionEntity.description: Represents broker entity based on the decode BROKER_ENTITY.

v1CounterPartySettlementInstructionExten.description: The query required to perform a filter query.

brokerTickers.description: Broker ticker for which broker desk data is to be retrieved.

deliveryName.description: Represents delivery name for the settlement instruction.

ids.description: List of Ids of the Counterparty Settlement instruction.

v1CounterPartySettlementInstructionQuery.title:
The query required to perform a filter query.
(-- api-linter: core::0203::optional-consistency=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because only one non-parent field behaviour needs to be set  --)

placeOfSettlement.title:
(-- api-linter: core::0140::prepositions=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because place_of_settlement refers to pset --)
Place Of Settlement (Attribute of settlement_parties)

loadDefunct.description: Load Defunct Flag - If true , will load all (including defuncts) , else will only load non defunct data.

counterPartySettlementInstructionExtende.description: Counterparty settlement instructions Extended Query containing additional filters on desk data.

filterType.description: Enum to determine the type of filter being performed - Basic/ Advanced.

v1CounterPartySettlementInstructionsSear.description:
Represents type of search being performed.

 - COUNTER_PARTY_SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTIONS_SEARCH_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The API will default to the BIC type
 - COUNTER_PARTY_SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTIONS_SEARCH_TYPE_BIC: This is the default value
Fields searched - BIC.

CounterPartySettlementInstructionAPI.CreateCounterPartySettlementInstructions.

 resource --)

counterPartySettlementInstruction.title: Counterparty settlement instructions

autoApproved.title:
Counter party settlement instruction to create is auto approved or not.
(-- api-linter: core::0133::request-unknown-fields=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We really need this field because creation
    supports two
 ways - unapproved and approved. --)

counterpartySettlementInstructionQuery.description: Query used to filter Counterparty Settlement instructions, such as broker ticker.
counterpartySettlementInstructionQuery.title: Filter Broker Counterparty Settlement instructions Query

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of CounterPartySettlementInstructions to return. The
service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified i.e 0, then complete list of
CounterPartySettlementInstructions will be returned.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous
'FilterCounterPartySettlementInstructions' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'FilterCounterPartySettlementInstructions' must match the call that provided
the page token.

counterpartySettlementInstructions.description: Counterparty settlement instructions to be returned.
counterpartySettlementInstructions.title: Counterparty settlement instructions

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

counterPartySettlementInstructions.description: Counter party settlement instruction to be returned.
counterPartySettlementInstructions.title: Counterparty settlement instructions

nextPageToken.description: A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page(Pagination is not supported currently).

v1SettlementInstructionState.description:
Enumeration of possible states of Counter Party Settlement Instructions.

 - SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTION_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTION_STATE_APPROVED: Approved cde=0.
 - SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTION_STATE_DELETED: Deleted cde=1.
 - SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTION_STATE_UNAPPROVED: Unapproved cde=3.
 - SETTLEMENT_INSTRUCTION_STATE_REJECTED: Rejected cde=4.

id.description: Id of the counter party settlement instruction to be un deleted.
